# Design Authoring Skill

## Overview

This skill focuses on creating technical design documents that translate requirements into implementable solutions.

## Key Capabilities

- Creating technical design documents
- Defining system architecture and components
- Documenting APIs and interfaces
- Creating diagrams and visual representations

## Best Practices

- Start with high-level overview, then add details
- Document key design decisions and rationale
- Include diagrams for complex components
- Consider scalability and maintainability

## Templates and Examples

### Design Document Template
```markdown
## Design: [Component Name]
- **Overview**: [High-level description]
- **Architecture**: [System components and interactions]
- **API Design**: [Interfaces and contracts]
- **Data Model**: [Data structures and relationships]
- **Trade-offs**: [Key decisions and alternatives considered]
```

- Spec Authoring
